work.name: Eindhoven University of Technology
work.summary: In this experimental project, I designed and developed colloidal systems to use as convenient model systems for studying crystallization and crystal defect formation. The project involved confocal microscopy (CLSM), electron microscopy (SEM/TEM), image analysis (with Python), light scattering measurements (SLS/DLS), and colloidal particle synthesis and characterization. [Link to my PhD thesis.](https://www.tue.nl/en/)
